channel.title: Adding drops to a delta-pwnscape server?
channel.description: i used to work with allstar based servers, how do you add drops to npc's on a delta-pwnscape based server?, there is no item2.java and item3.java in my source, but i think theres still monster drops.....any help please? :(

item.title: Adding drops to a delta-pwnscape server?
item.dc:creator: @johnpk johnpk
item.description:
@johnpk wrote:

dude are y[quote=“the hunt, post:1, topic:291138”][quote author=johnpk link=topic=384861.msg2886705#msg2886705 date=1248656781]
i used to work with allstar based servers, how do you add drops to npc’s on a delta-pwnscape based server?, there is no item2.java and item3.java in my source, but i think theres still monster drops…any help please?
[/quote]

fucking serious. tutorial section. or the search button. or a brain.[/quote]dude a[quote=“the hunt, post:1, topic:291138”][quote author=johnpk link=topic=384861.msg2886705#msg2886705 date=1248656781]
i used to work with allstar based servers, how do you add drops to npc’s on a delta-pwnscape based server?, there is no item2.java and item3.java in my source, but i think theres still monster drops…any help please?
[/quote]

fucking serious. tutorial section. or the search button. or a brain.[/quote]dude are you retarded, your going and posting fucking serious, tutorial section, to like every post on here, sthu…and its not that easy to find a guide saying how to make monster drops on a delta server,it doesnt say how to do it on a delta-pwnscape server, dumb***
